medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient developed acute epigastric pain yesterday morning without apparent trigger. The pain was approximately 5 to 8 out of ten in intensity and accompanied by malaise. The pain radiated to the upper back and did not improve or worsen with any measures.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Coronary artery disease status post coronary artery bypass grafting (s/p CABG), diabetes mellitus type 2, essential hypertension, hypercholesterolemia, osteoporosis, unspecified thrombocytosis, unspecified leukocytosis, myeloproliferative disease, obesity, chronic kidney disease stage III (moderate), vitamin D deficiency, proximal phalanx fracture, and falls.
